title: Sweetheart Sona (Splash Art) Designer?
body: anyone knows who designed the splash art for Sweetheart Sona?

replies.body: It was a collaborative effort between a few artists.
where is access to wallpaper sizes for this? some people like the splash art soo much that they want a wallpaper for their desktop, i mean, these should be available wtf
As Moonboy65 pointed out, we usually offer them up as 1920 x 1080.

Everytime a new skin comes out, its usually a hunt to find the splash art. Even the top google results for just about every skin art goes to fan sites. It would be great if there was an official page dedicated just to wallpaper downloads! Something I can bookmark and return to easily!
That's a sweet idea! I can poke around and see if something like that's possible. During the announcement of a skin, we usually have the splash available there, as well as in the patch notes. ^-^
